name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto 'Replies' Expander for MS Teams Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This auto-expands replies for Microsoft Teams, similar to my other chrome extensionâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This auto-expands replies for Microsoft Teams, similar to my other chrome extension (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/auto-see-more-for-microso/hkhcgcfccnnemjbgcnjlbnbghaakpmla?hl=en), that helps to expand "See More" messages. 

The code is fully open source, so you can take a look at it here too - https://github.com/joshuaquek/auto-expand-collapsed-replies-msteamsweb

Please leave a good review if it works for you!
